data.text: On Thursday (April 14), the team behind cross-chain bridge Allbridge announced that it had “successfully integrated support for XRP Ledger (XRPL), a decentralized, public blockchain built for payments,” delivering on a promise it made back in January. data.title: Ethereum Price Prediction: How Merge Delay is Impacting the Prices
data.text: Ethereum prices were looking more likely to go up after the news of the launch of the new Merge technology was announced.
